ema sakachchawedi idiri mathiwaranayedi gathayuthu kriyamarga sambandhawa wadiwashayen awadhanaya yomuwa athayida wartha wana athara aanduwa niyojanaya karamin mema sakachchawa sandaha jon senewirathna, susil premjayantha, ti.bi.eekanayaka, nimal siripala da silwa, nimal lansa yana amathiwarun ekwa thibena bawath, eekabaddha wipakshaya niyojanaya karamin gamini lokuge, bandula gunawardhana, keheliya rambaukwalla, dalas alahapperuma yana mahathwarun saha hitapu palath palana niyojithayan kihipadenekuda ekwa athi bawath ema aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.

aadaraniya amme thaththe ada un hadanne amarikawen loketama dipu gugal haraha blog kiyala atamagalak atawagena ape aluth paramparawe mola hodanna.onna amarikawe obama goyiya afganisthaneta,iraketa bomba danakota aha kana piyagena hitapu nawanidan pille enawalu lankawata api manawa himikam rakinawada balanna.ee enakotama menna nishshabda sahan kiyala enjioo salli walin blog kiyana kadamallak atawagaththa amarikan puthek liyala lipiyak "shri lankawe aarthikayata anagathayedi wiya haki de" kiyala.api me mahinda chinthanaya yatathe aarthikaya yahamagata ganna hadanakota, warayawal hadanakota, adhiwegimarga hadanakota,guwanthotupolawal hadanakota,eekapudgala aadayama dolar haradahata naginakota, api apema gamanak yanakota thamayi me "sayilant sahanla" apita kiyanne mewa balanna epa, bada gana hithanna, manawa himikam gana hithanna, nithiye aadhipathyaya gana hithanna budu amme menna yaka enawo, naya bara wadiwela, api naya wela arakada mekada hama kemanakma,ayi hathwalame kalin hitapu aandu naya gaththe nadda aa..?
